actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to the nominating of individuals for election to the offices of the President and Vice President of the United States.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides for the nomination of the President and Vice-President by direct popular vote in a special primary election to be held for such purpose. Sets forth procedures governing such primary election.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to the nominating of individuals for election to the offices of the President and Vice President of the United States.
